title: Atoms

acceptance.prompt: Answer the concept check in clear sentences.

brief: Quick concept refresh. Read the brief, answer the check-for-understanding question, and you’re done.

exercise.title: Concept check — atoms
exercise.instructions: Explain in 2-3 sentences: What determines an atom’s element identity, and how do electrons influence chemical behavior?
exercise.answerKey: Proton count defines the element; valence electrons drive bonding/reactivity.
